LanguageData.AbilityNeurotrainerUsed: {USER_labelShort} used neurotrainer to learn the {1} power.
LanguageData.Reward_RoyalFavor: whoever accepted the quest will receive {1} {0_royalFavorLabel} from {0_name}
LanguageData.Reward_RoyalFavor_ChoosePawn: you may choose one of the participating {2} to receive {1} {0_royalFavorLabel} from {0_name}
LanguageData.PsyfocusDesc: Psyfocus is a special type of mental structuring which is necessary to use psychic powers. Psyfocus dissipates over time, and must be built by regular meditation. Losing all psyfocus makes someone unable to use psychic powers, but has no other consequences.\n\nHigher levels of psyfocus permit higher-level powers, but also increase the rate of psyfocus dissipation
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerAnimusStoneAndShrineAb: Per nearby animus stone {2}, nature shrine {1} (max {0})
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerAnimusStoneAndShrine: Per nearby animus stone {3}, nature shrine {2} ({0} / {1})

LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerSculpture: Max {2} per nearby sculpture depending on quality ({0} / {1})

LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerGrave: Per nearby grave {2} if empty, {3} for human corpse ({0} / {1})
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerFlameAbstract: {1} per nearby lit flame source (up to {0})

LanguageData.BeginLinkingRitualNeedLinkSpot: Need a free, reachable spot within 3 cells for linking
LanguageData.LetterTextLinkingRitualCompleted: {PAWN_labelShort} has completed the linking ritual with {LINKABLE_labelShort}.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} now has an upgraded psylink, permitting the use of new psychic powers.
LanguageData.LetterTextLinkingRitualCompletedAnimaGra: Additionally, {0} anima grass has been restored.
LanguageData.BestowingCeremonyThroneroomRequirementsN: {PAWN_definite}'s throneroom does not satisfy the requirements of the title of {TITLE}.
The bestower is offended that {PAWN_definite}'s throneroom does not satisfy the requirements of the title of {TITLE}. The bestowing ceremony has been cancelled.
LanguageData.BestowingOutcomeQualitySpecific: Bestowing ceremony total quality was {0}, determined by these factors
LanguageData.RitualTargetAnimaTreeNoPawnsToLink: No colonists that can link with anima tree right now.
LanguageData.RitualTargetAnimaTreeNoPawnsWithNatureFo: No colonists with the natural meditation focus type.
LanguageData.RitualTargetAnimaTreeMustBeCapableOfNatu: Must be a colonist with the natural meditation focus type who is below maximum psylink level.
LanguageData.AnimaLinkingExplanationBase: The anima linking ceremony is more powerful with more participants. The more people participate, the less time the ceremony takes, and the more anima grass will grow.\n\nWith {0} additional participants, {1} anima grass will be restored at the end of the ceremony.
LanguageData.ShuttleRequiredItemsNotSatisfied: Not all required cargo is loaded yet!
